title: Womens Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of good quality, soft, and comfortable, with a great fit that works well over the stomach area.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, great color
items.body: Very soft. The rich vibrant green color was as pictured. It hangs nicely and fits around the hips. I have only worn it once and haven't washed it, but it kept its shape and did not end up with snags and pilling. I was very pleased with the quality. Read more
items.author: Beth Keene

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars beautiful
items.body: This is a great sweater--looks exactly as it does online. Yarn is soft and of medium thickness; great for fall and winter, but will be entirely too warm for spring and summer. I'm an 18 in blouses, generally a 16-18 XL. Bought the XL and it fits perfectly--exactly as it does on the model online wearing the white pants. Gave 4 stars because after one wearing the ends of the sleeves seem to have stretched out, not sure if it will continue to stretch out. I have not washed it yet; it might go back to size after washing. I would like to buy it in other colors. Read more
items.author: shoecrazy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Think twice, if you don't have broad or well-defined shoulders.
items.body: The quality of this was pretty good. And the style is really pretty in the pictures. I rated it a 3 because it's not easy to tell by the models that are used in the listing, but it's really meant for people who have more well-defined or broad shoulders. I am short, a bit on the heavy side, and given the style with the bat wing sleeves, the sloping shoulders just made me look very droopy and short and stocky. I mean I am short and stocky I guess, but you don't want your clothes to emphasize that LOL!! Read more
items.author: SD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish
items.body: Material is soft. Feels good on. Was wrinkled a bit but I used an iron with steam and they came right out. Just go gently on your settings as not to scorch. Great fit. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made, Stylish & Comfortable
items.body: Very cute, comfortable, and well-constructed sweater top that's not heavy (but not thin) and, thankfully, doesn't have full bat wing sleeves...you won't look like you're about to take flight. Sleeves on my 5'4", long torso frame come up two inches above my wrist bones, unlike the model photo whose sleeves appear to hit about 4 inches above her wrists. Sleeves are still a stylish, shorter length even though longer on me than in the website photo. Also, this top is true to size -- 38D and 140 lbs, size Medium was perfect without a tight fit on the front or back. Love everything about this sweater! Read more
items.author: Bargain Hunter

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars batwing arms lack shape
items.body: Disappointed in batwing arms. There is no differentiating shape at top of sleeve to bottom. It is just a straight large cut arm. It does feel nice though, and warm. But going back because not as cute as picture. Read more
items.author: Amazon fan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric, but heavy
items.body: The fabric on the sweater is tight-knit. It feels soft and even a little luxurious. I will say that the torso is shorter than expected but the cut is still cute overall. The top is easy to wash, dry, wear. Black goes well with basically everything. The sleeves add whimsy to top and gives it a nice shape as it drapes. The only drawback I have is that the thick, tight-knit fabric means this top is much heavier than expected. Not sure if I'll overheat as I've only worn it in A/C, but that is something to keep in mind when considering purchasing. Read more
items.author: Jackie NK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stylish
items.body: This is a light weight sweater that fits perfectly over my stomach - covering it, not tight and without it being too long. I wear this when the temperature is in the 60's. Read more
items.author: Elissa

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red, Brown, Gray, Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Dark Gray, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
